content:
CONTRACT AGREEMENT

This agreement ("Agreement") is made and entered into on the date of acceptance by both parties, by and between Beanstalk Consulting LLC dba "Beanstalk Consulting" ("Consultant"), and Caller Intercept LLC ("Client").

1. Term of Agreement: This Agreement shall have a term of 3 months, starting on the date of acceptance by both parties.
2. Services Included: During the term of this Agreement, Consultant shall provide the following services to Client: virtual SDR program, purchase of up to 2 domains for cold email outreach, up to 800 prospects a month via Apollo, Inbox management for call scheduling, campaign & offer creation, Campaign testing and analytics.
3. Payment: Client shall pay Consultant a monthly rate of $2250 for the services provided under this Agreement. The first month of this Agreement will be paid upfront at a rate of $6,750. If additional setup time is needed, Client and Consultant will mutually agree on extending the first month but it will be billed at the same rate.
4. Optional Add Ons: The following add-ons are available to Client at an additional cost: Virtual Cold Caller, Handwritten Direct Mail Campaigns ($6.50/send), Sales Strategy Consulting ($200/hour for Dean), Additional Lead Sourcing.
5. Testimonials: During the first 90 days of this Agreement, Client shall provide a written
